item.title: Install Hugo Develop Invironments on Windows 10/11
item.description: Releases · gohugoio/hugo How to install Hugo on Windows? (2020) extract start → edit the system enviroment variables → evironment variables → path → edit → new → hugo folder url → done! (remember to open a new PowerShell window)
